Html:
We just had to completely rebuild our WSUS server. Uninstalled and Re-installed the Role from the server with a new Database. Is there a way to get the WPP published updates back to where they were before we had to rebuild? I have all of the old files saved.

Thanks
Sorry, but you have to publish again those packages. You should have export from Wsus (using wsusUtil /export) BEFORE deleting the database.
